channel.title: Thanks to our moderators
channel.description:
I just wanted to say thanks to the initial group of contributors and moderators. Without them we literally wouldn't be doing this.
- [Mike Jones][1] - [Rachen Andrew][2] - [Eric Barnes][3] - [Ryan Tablada][4]
They'll be here helping everyone get started, breaking up fights and generally helping us define the spirit of this community. Thanks!
[1]: https://twitter.com/imsickofmaps [2]: https://twitter.com/rachelandrew [3]: https://twitter.com/ericlbarnes [4]: https://twitter.com/RyanTablada

item.title: Thanks to our moderators
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
I’d like to second the “thanks”. This forum is something that software founders at all stages would benefit from, and yet, I know how difficult it is to bring something like this up without the help and contributions of motivated moderators and other people. Thanks to all of you!

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks to our moderators
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
Thanks for the shout out … I’m excited! Lets hope it’s the start of something that adds value to all of our businesses. Guess I should write an Introduction now I’ve started participating

Read full topic

item.title: Thanks to our moderators
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
I just wanted to say thanks to the initial group of contributors and moderators. Without them we literally wouldn’t be doing this.

  • Mike Jones
  • Rachen Andrew
  • Eric Barnes
  • Ryan Tablada

They’ll be here helping everyone get started, breaking up fights and generally helping us define the spirit of this community. Thanks!

Read full topic
